home.welcomeSubtitle: Comprehensive healthcare solutions at your fingertips. Find doctors, hospitals, medicines, and get AI-powered health assistance.
home.findDoctorsDesc: Search and connect with qualified healthcare professionals near you.
home.hospitalNetworkDesc: Access our extensive network of trusted hospitals and medical centers.
home.medicineCatalogDesc: Browse, search, and order medicines with detailed information.
home.aiHealthDesc: Get instant health guidance powered by advanced AI technology.
home.feature24x7Desc: Round-the-clock access to healthcare services and emergency support.
home.featureExpertCareDesc: Connect with certified doctors and healthcare professionals.
home.featureAiPoweredDesc: Advanced AI assistance for health queries and symptom analysis.
home.featureSecureDesc: Your health data is protected with enterprise-grade security.

aiAssistant.title: AI Health Assistant
aiAssistant.subtitle: Powered by Google Gemini - Your 24/7 healthcare companion
aiAssistant.disclaimerText: This AI assistant provides general health information only and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always consult with qualified healthcare providers for medical concerns.
aiAssistant.initialMessage: Hello! I'm your AI Health Assistant powered by Google Gemini. I can help you with symptom analysis, health advice, and medical information. Please note that I'm not a replacement for professional medical care. How can I assist you today?
aiAssistant.placeholder: Type your health question or describe your symptoms...

quickInfo.healthHistoryDesc: Track your medical history and share with doctors

quickInfo.emergencyGuideDesc: Quick access to emergency procedures and contacts
